Name: You've defeated a Bound-Shark
Description: Its bonds buckled, its skin torn, its teeth shattered.

DefaultEvent.Name: Tough and grey
DefaultEvent.Description: The shark-meat is dark, springy and oily. These are not encouraging properties for a meal. Nevertheless, your cook, perhaps, can make something of it. And what's this in its gut?

ChildBranches.Name: Use its meat
ChildBranches.Description: Its torment ended with its death. You have more immediate concerns.

DefaultEvent.Name: The geometries of agony
DefaultEvent.Description: How did it move? How could it move? The shapes it formed - the leaps it managed - the impossible gyrations - it was as if its pain forced - permitted - it to move in directions not normally perceptible to our eyes. These are not, one would hope, truths that you have uncovered, but they may be useful approximations.

ChildBranches.Name: Record any Observations
ChildBranches.Description: If you've gathered at least 10 Observations, you may learn something...

DefaultEvent.Name: A painful mystery
DefaultEvent.Description: You learn little, except that someone is merciless and inventive. The pain this creature must have suffered! You take a tooth as a trophy: if your hull is damaged, your engineer will repurpose some of its cage as repair materials.

ChildBranches.Name: Examine its cage-armature
ChildBranches.Description: Someone has bound it savagely with black iron - sunk bands and joined mechanisms deep into its flesh.
